description.title: Kilo
description.content: Headed and founded by award-winning designer, Lars Larsen, Kilo is a Copenhagen based idea-driven industrial design studio established in 2005 and today among Scandinavia’s most influential. At the cross-section between technology and culture, Kilo designs with a holistic approach merging innovation and strategi in search for improved solutions for the future

clients.title: Clients
clients.content: From startups to major corporations, Kilo is internationally recognized for delivering bold and lasting design innovation for leading-edge clients, irrespective of size. Non-specialized when it comes to market sectors, many clients choose us for that reason alone when they need fresh perspectives and alternative takes on their brands and markets.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: For more than a decade we have brought lasting design solutions to life in close collaboration with ambitious clients. We have received a line of international honors and awards in our quest of shaping and improving the world surrounding us. We believe great work is born from collaboration and a shared ambition to design for change.
